content.question: If a single firm can produce and supply an entire market at a lower unit cost than many small firms can, the long-run average total cost must be

choices.label: remaining constant as firm size increases
decreasing as the firm’s output increases
constant and equal to marginal cost

content.answer: decreasing as the firm’s output increases
